TopicTitle: A Delta-V map for the Kerbol Plus mod

Articles.Content:
Kind of like this: [http://i.imgur.com/OYX9d4K.png](http://i.imgur.com/OYX9d4K.png)

But for the whole Kerbol system as well as the planets and moons that were added in the Kerbol Plus mod: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118643-1-0-Kopernicus-KerbolPlus-v-2-0-a-planet-pack-that-ads-the-legendary-Gas-Planet-2-and-many-more?p=1893529#post1893529](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118643-1-0-Kopernicus-KerbolPlus-v-2-0-a-planet-pack-that-ads-the-legendary-Gas-Planet-2-and-many-more?p=1893529#post1893529)

I wouldn't use it if I were you the creator does not test the mod before publishing it and it has been know that some of the planets aren't able to be landed on and you may lose ships/crew trying. YMMV.

> 
> it has been know that some of the planets aren't able to be landed on and you may lose ships/crew trying. YMMV.

Thats BS because I was able to send a flyby probe to Sarvin (gas planet 2). With a bigger rocket (either built in orbit or launched in one go) and a few mod parts like near future propulsion you could probably land on the planets and moons.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-09T17:28:59Z" title="08/09/2015 05:28  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 9, 2015</time> by kerbonaut101**

I mean the planets are glitched the terrain may disappear or not be as smooth as it looks once you are close enough to land. No need to be offended I am only telling you what I heard. It isn't that you can't get there it's the planets themselves that are glitched. Also talking about a gas giant that doesn't even have the same planet terrain mods as normal planets does not prove any point you were trying to make.
I would wait for the mod to be fixed--right now it's quite buggy and landing on many of the bodies is glitchy if not impossible.

I don't know of any delta-V maps for Kerbol Plus. Perhaps someone could make one.

And yes, the planets and moons are nice to look at from space but expect bugs on landing. The one I had is touching down but being considered as flying still. Workaround for that is to quicksave, edit it to landed, and load again.
